review: The plus point of this hotel is its location . It is located bang in the middle of the city. Rooms are average and the food is also OK. For the price at which the hotel sells its rooms its a value for money proposition.
name: Alok S

review: The hotel is a clean, good hotel and as good as any. For the price it charges the room quality, cleanliness and ambience are great. The location and food quality are excellent and the staff is also most couteous and cooperative.
name: Sureka S

review: The hotel is a good place for short stays. The staff is very cooperative ans cordial. The rooms are clean and the food is good.The location of the hotel ia excellent and the pricing ia such as will  ot hurt your pocket.
name: Alok S

review: This place is as good as any in Rudrapur. Good location, good food, decent and clean rooms make it a perfect place to stay.   The ease of accessibility to all business places  is a tremendous advantage if you stay at this place.
name: Alok S

review: A centrally located hotel at a very economical price. All major conveniences are located nearby. This makes it an ideal hotel for a budget traveller .Food quality and taste and room cleanliness and d√©cor are also good.
name: Alok S

review: Have been to this hotel again recently and find the service quality decent and acceptable. The rooms are neat,clean and well laid out and the service is good. Location of the hotel is very central and pricing economical. A very good place, Recommended for short stays.
name: Alok S

review: Since i prefer hotels close to market and city this hotel my bill perfectly. The location is very central right in the middle of the city where you can access the market and shop for anything. Food is OK and so also service.   Highly recommended for a budget traveller to Rudrapur.
name: Alok S

review: good sevice, location is gud and very corporative staff good taste on the regular fooding light food less spice ... gud experience...pick up car was very comfortable .................... . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .
name: sharvesh
